div.p: MELANCHTHON Phil DanielMELANCHTHON Phil,.(): Danielis enarratio. Praefatio ad regem Ferdinandum.— Haguenau, J. Secer1529, in-80. Graesse IV, p. 468. 2631 MELANCHTHON Phil DanielMELANCHTHON Phil,.( Declamationes): Declamationum omnium quae ab ipso et aliis in Academia Wittebergensi recitatae sunt, optime ordine in tres tomos dist. T. I- III. opera et studio M. Joh. Richardii.— Strasbourg 1570, in-8°. Graesse IV, p. 468.[ Ritter, Rép, nos 1558- 1560: Th. Rihell. 2632 MELANCHTHON Phil DanielMELANCHTHON Phil,.( Dialectica):.. Guillaume, Strasbourg; Walter: Sélestatno 1860. ( Ritter, Répertoire bibliogr, n° 1536; éd.
